content.raw:
sorry for the poor behavior. I uploaded the new controller tarball to facilitate testing of pull request #18 which enables control of more arm joints and the head/neck, but it does expose a lack of damping in the neck controller. This has been fixed in the val_description repository, but it hasn't been released yet:

* https://gitlab.com/nasa-jsc-robotics/val_description/merge_requests/15

My apologies for the broken state, but it will be fixed soon.
content.html:
sorry for the poor behavior. I uploaded the new controller tarball to facilitate testing of pull request #18 which enables control of more arm joints and the head/neck, but it does expose a lack of damping in the neck controller. This has been fixed in the val_description repository, but it hasn't been released yet:

  • https://gitlab.com/nasa-jsc-robotics/val_description/merge_requests/15

My apologies for the broken state, but it will be fixed soon.
